get.description: get the current xur location if he is currently somewhere

200.description:
json: a XurLocation object, or null if xur is not visiting the specified day

txt: xur's location or a blank string if xur is not visiting the specified day

schema.description:
a short string describing xur's location, i.e. "Winding Cove, EDZ"

a blank string if xur is not visiting the specified day

get.description: get xur's location for a specific date

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
a date in the format
YYYY/MM/DD (month/day leading zeroes)

must be today's date (UTC) or earlier, and it must be a valid date
(June 44th 2020 will return a 404)

2020/12/01 means from daily reset 2020/12/01 to daily reset 2020/12/02

destiny's daily reset takes place on the same numerical date, in both PST/PDT, and UTC

200.description:
json: a XurLocation object, or null if xur is not visiting the specified day

txt: xur's location, or a blank string if xur is not visiting the specified day

schema.description:
a short string describing xur's location, i.e. "Winding Cove, EDZ"

a blank string if xur is not visiting the specified day

XurLocation.description: an object describing xur's location, or null if xur is not visiting the specified day

location.description:
a simple lowercase string, one of the following:

edz, titan, nessus, io, tower

placeHash.description:
a hash corresponding to the DestinyPlaceDefinition for this
location

destinationHash.description:
a hash corresponding to the DestinyDestinationDefinition for this
location

bubbleIndex.description:
an index pointing to the DestinyBubbleDefinition for this location,
within DestinyDestinationDefinition.bubbles

placeName.description:
the english display name for the DestinyPlaceDefinition, i.e.
"European Dead Zone"

destinationName.description:
the english display name for the DestinyDestinationDefinition, i.e.
"European Dead Zone"

bubbleName.description:
the english display name for the DestinyBubbleDefinition, i.e.
"Winding Cove"

returnformat.name: format
returnformat.description: "json" or "txt" depending on the desired return format and MIME type
